question: In which season did Bursaspor win the Süper Lig championship?
asked_question_translated: Kurā sezonā Bursaspor uzvarēja Süper Lig čempionātā?
answer: Bursaspor uzvarēja Süper Lig čempionātā 2009.–2010. gada sezonā.
answer_translated_eng: Bursaspor won the Süper Lig Championship in the 2009-10 season.
